document.full_text: anaheim ducks forward jarkko ruutu has been suspended one game for delivering a late hit to nashville predators forward martin erat during their western conference quarter-final game, the nhl said on thursday.
document.title: ducks' jarkko ruutu banned one playoff game for late hit
lines_and_colors: anaheim ducks forward jarkko ruutu has been suspended one game for delivering a late hit to nashville predators forward martin erat during their western conference quarter-final game, the nhl said on thursday.
